title: The guy who recorded the Eric Garner killing got arrested and indicted by a grand jury

embed.description: Grand Jury Indicted The Man Who Filmed Eric Garner's KillingA New York City grand jury decided yesterday not to indict the police officer who choked Eric Garner to death back in July. However, Ramsey Orta, who was present and actually filmed Garner being choked, received a grand jury indictment shortly after the incident, reported The Huffington Post.

body:
And so did his wife.

There is no justice in this country.
